DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine use HeartMath 's biofeedback emWave Pro daily mindfulness practice : practical effective intervention improve job satisfaction performance physician , advance practice clinician , nurse ; improve patient satisfaction ; affect rest blood pressure heart rate compare baseline follow-up measure .
DOC.detailed_description: This research study seek determine use daily mindfulness practice EmWave Pro HeartMath help achieve coherence various standardize , interactive mindfulness technique , guide meditation focus positive emotion , breathing , imagery . The investigator seek determine use HeartMath 's biofeedback emWave Pro daily mindfulness practice : practical effective intervention improve job satisfaction performance physician , advance practice clinician , nurse ; improve patient satisfaction ; affect rest blood pressure heart rate compare baseline follow-up measure . All participant attend one-time one-hour training session explain cardiac coherence use emWave Pro . Participants randomize either treatment group control group . Participants use emWave Pro least one 5-minute session daily , Monday Friday . The treatment participant use daily 12 week . The control participant use daily week 7-12 . The treatment group add component weekly visit first 6 week study investigator research coordinator . The purpose weekly visit focus reinforce accountability achievement coherence . The participant also complete questionnaire baseline , week 6 , week 12 demographic , job satisfaction , job performance . Participants ' blood pressure heart rate collect three time point . Additionally , information participant ' use HeartMath , sick day , patient satisfaction collect week 12 .
DOC.criteria: Individuals ( physician , Advanced Registered Nurse Practitioner ( ARNPs ) & Physician Assistants [ advance practice clinician ] , nurse ) work two research site : Hampton Oaks Haile Plantation UF Health Anyone work Hampton Oaks Haile Plantation UF Health
